title: 08/19/2021 - HOUR 1 - Warriors, Rodgers, Dalton
itunes:title: 08/19/2021 - HOUR 1 - Warriors, Rodgers, Dalton
description:
Colin talks about Kevin Durant's final season with the Warriors and the end of that dynasty

Aaron Rodgers says he was thinking about retiring

There's nothing wrong with Andy Dalton being confident


Guest: Eric Mangini

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
